channel.title: CVE Feed for theeventscalendar -- Event Tickets and Registration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for theeventscalendar -- Event Tickets and Registration

item.title: CVE-2024-2261|2024-08-01T19:03:39.190Z -- theeventscalendar -- event%20tickets%20and%20registration
item.description: The Event Tickets and Registration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.2 via the RSVP functionality. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to extract sensitive data including emails and street addresses.

item.title: CVE-2024-2261|2024-07-25T18:49:10.838Z -- theeventscalendar -- event%20tickets%20and%20registration
item.description: The Event Tickets and Registration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.2 via the RSVP functionality. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to extract sensitive data including emails and street addresses.

item.title: CVE-2024-1053|2024-02-22T05:32:49.364Z -- theeventscalendar -- event%20tickets%20and%20registration
item.description: The Event Tickets and Registration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'email' action in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to email the attendees list to themselves.
